page.title: 08CHARLTON-HANK.RELIGION
page.content: {Charlton and Hankerton Parish churches are both Church of England.There are no resident clergy but the priest in charge for Hankerton has 4 other pari- shes and the one for Charlton has two other parishes.There is one service each Sunday in each church and the {1662 service}is used for one Matins and one Communion Service each month. The alternative Service book is used at other times.Each church has a Paro- chial Church Council.Members of both congregations belong to the{Mothers' {Union}which meets once a month.There is a{Sunday School}at Hankerton Church every other Sunday.Many{charities}are supported annually by the village.Fund raising this year is especially direc- ted to raising money for the repair of the Church roof which is expected to cost{Â£10,000.
